attributes.name: HomeFeeManagerMultiAMBErc20ToErc677

attributes.documentation: @dev Throws if given fee percentage is >= 100%.

addRewardAddress(address).details: Adds a new reward address to the list, which will receive fees collected from the bridge operations. Only the owner can call this method.

calculateFee(bytes32,address,uint256).details: Calculates the amount of fee to pay for the value of the particular fee type.

params._feeType: type of the updated fee, can be one of [HOME_TO_FOREIGN_FEE, FOREIGN_TO_HOME_FEE].
params._token: address of the token contract for which fee should apply, 0x00..00 describes the initial fee for newly created tokens.
params._value: bridged value, for which fee should be evaluated.

calculateFee(bytes32,address,uint256).return: amount of fee to be subtracted from the transferred value.

dailyLimit(address).details: Retrieves current daily limit for a particular token contract.
dailyLimit(address).return: daily limit on tokens that can be sent through the bridge per day.

executionDailyLimit(address).details: Retrieves current execution daily limit for a particular token contract.
executionDailyLimit(address).return: daily limit on tokens that can be received from the bridge on the other side per day.

executionMaxPerTx(address).details: Retrieves current maximum execution amount of tokens per one transfer for a particular token contract.
executionMaxPerTx(address).return: maximum amount on tokens that can received from the bridge on the other side in one transaction.

getFee(bytes32,address).details: Retrieves the value for the particular fee type.

params._feeType: type of the updated fee, can be one of [HOME_TO_FOREIGN_FEE, FOREIGN_TO_HOME_FEE].
params._token: address of the token contract for which fee should apply, 0x00..00 describes the initial fee for newly created tokens.

getFee(bytes32,address).return: fee value associated with the requested fee type.

getNextRewardAddress(address).details: Retrieves next reward address in the linked list, or F_ADDR if given address is the last one.
getNextRewardAddress(address).return: address of the next reward receiver.

isRewardAddress(address).details: Checks if specified address is included into the registered rewards receivers list.
isRewardAddress(address).return: true, if specified address is associated with one of the registered reward accounts.

isTokenRegistered(address).details: Checks if specified token was already bridged at least once.
isTokenRegistered(address).return: true, if token address is address(0) or token was already bridged.

maxAvailablePerTx(address).details: Retrieves maximum available bridge amount per one transaction taking into account maxPerTx() and dailyLimit() parameters.

params._token: address of the token contract, or address(0) for the default limit.

maxAvailablePerTx(address).return: minimum of maxPerTx parameter and remaining daily quota.

maxPerTx(address).details: Retrieves current maximum amount of tokens per one transfer for a particular token contract.
maxPerTx(address).return: maximum amount on tokens that can be sent through the bridge in one transfer.

minPerTx(address).details: Retrieves current minimum amount of tokens per one transfer for a particular token contract.
minPerTx(address).return: minimum amount on tokens that can be sent through the bridge in one transfer.

owner().details: Tells the address of the owner

removeRewardAddress(address).details: Removes a reward address from the rewards list. Only the owner can call this method.

params._addr: old reward account, that should be removed.

rewardAddressCount().details: Retrieves amount of registered reward accounts.

rewardAddressList().return: address list of the registered reward receivers.

setDailyLimit(address,uint256).details: Updates daily limit for the particular token. Only owner can call this method.

params._dailyLimit: daily allowed amount of bridged tokens, should be greater than maxPerTx. 0 value is also allowed, will stop the bridge operations in outgoing direction.
params._token: address of the token contract, or address(0) for configuring the efault limit.

setExecutionDailyLimit(address,uint256).details: Updates execution daily limit for the particular token. Only owner can call this method.

params._dailyLimit: daily allowed amount of executed tokens, should be greater than executionMaxPerTx. 0 value is also allowed, will stop the bridge operations in incoming direction.
params._token: address of the token contract, or address(0) for configuring the default limit.

setExecutionMaxPerTx(address,uint256).details: Updates execution maximum per transaction for the particular token. Only owner can call this method.

params._maxPerTx: maximum amount of executed tokens per one transaction, should be less than executionDailyLimit. 0 value is also allowed, will stop the bridge operations in incoming direction.
params._token: address of the token contract, or address(0) for configuring the default limit.

setFee(bytes32,address,uint256).details: Updates the value for the particular fee type. Only the owner can call this method.

params._fee: new fee value, in percentage (1 ether == 10**18 == 100%).
params._feeType: type of the updated fee, can be one of [HOME_TO_FOREIGN_FEE, FOREIGN_TO_HOME_FEE].
params._token: address of the token contract for which fee should apply, 0x00..00 describes the initial fee for newly created tokens.

setMaxPerTx(address,uint256).details: Updates maximum per transaction for the particular token. Only owner can call this method.

params._maxPerTx: maximum amount of tokens per one transaction, should be less than dailyLimit, greater than minPerTx. 0 value is also allowed, will stop the bridge operations in outgoing direction.
params._token: address of the token contract, or address(0) for configuring the default limit.

setMinPerTx(address,uint256).details: Updates minumum per transaction for the particular token. Only owner can call this method.

params._minPerTx: minumum amount of tokens per one transaction, should be less than maxPerTx and dailyLimit.
params._token: address of the token contract, or address(0) for configuring the default limit.

totalExecutedPerDay(address,uint256).details: Retrieves the total executed amount for particular token during specific day.

params._day: day number for which spent amount if requested.

totalExecutedPerDay(address,uint256).return: amount of tokens received from the bridge from the other side.

totalSpentPerDay(address,uint256).details: Retrieves the total spent amount for particular token during specific day.

params._day: day number for which spent amount if requested.

totalSpentPerDay(address,uint256).return: amount of tokens sent through the bridge to the other side.

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: the address to transfer ownership to.

withinExecutionLimit(address,uint256).details: Checks that bridged amount of tokens conforms to the configured execution limits.
withinExecutionLimit(address,uint256).return: true, if specified amount can be processed and executed.

withinLimit(address,uint256).details: Checks that bridged amount of tokens conforms to the configured limits.
withinLimit(address,uint256).return: true, if specified amount can be bridged.
